backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing party ledger backend with CRUD operations for parties, payments, visit records, shop branding, user profiles, and admin/staff authorization using access control mixins and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: dashboard notifications for today's visits with call buttons (REQ-1) and Reports page search filtering by party name/phone/PAN (REQ-2).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend TypeScript/React files covering routing, hooks, utilities, components, and pages with details on caching strategies, authentication, and UI functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color schemes including sidebar, chart, and UI component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Party Ledger application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring React Query, TanStack Router with routes for dashboard, parties, reports, settings, visits, and map, plus theme provider and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddAdminPr: Dialog component for adding new admin principals with Principal ID validation, form submission, and error handling using React Query mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPrinc: Admin panel displaying list of admin principals with add/remove functionality, current user indication, and protection against removing the last admin.
frontend/src/components/admin/StaffManag: Component for managing staff users with add/remove capabilities (content truncated in source).
frontend/src/components/alerts/DueTodayD: Alert dialog component that displays parties with payments due today, allowing users to view individual party details by navigating to their page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Full-screen card component displaying an access denied message with an optional custom reason for permission failures.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Error screen shown when application initialization fails, providing retry and reload page options.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen component with Internet Identity authentication, featuring a branded card layout with login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Error screen specifically for profile loading failures, offering retry and reload functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup, collecting the user's name with form validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ResetAdminP: Empty file placeholder for admin password reset dialog component.
frontend/src/components/auth/StaffLoginS: Empty file placeholder for staff-specific login screen component.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupLoad: Simple loading screen with spinner and customizable message displayed during application startup.
frontend/src/components/auth/TopLevelErr: React error boundary component that catches top-level errors and displays a self-contained error UI with reload functionality.
frontend/src/components/branding/Brandin: Header component displaying shop logo and name from branding settings, with fallback to default values.
Settings card for managing shop branding including name and logo upload with progress tracking using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TodayN: Dashboard card component showing parties with payments due today, including call buttons with phone links and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/import/ExcelPart: Card component for importing parties from Excel files with batch processing, progress tracking, and error handling. Parses Excel data, generates party IDs, and adds parties in batches of 10.
Main application layout shell with navigation bar, branding header, and footer. Provides navigation to Dashboard, Parties, New Visit, Map, Reports, and Settings pages with logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/parties/PartyFor: Dialog form for adding or editing party records with fields for name, address, phone, PAN, and due amount. Handles party ID generation and validation before submission.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Dialog form for recording payments with amount, comment, and optional next payment date fields. Requires next payment date when amount is zero.
Displays a list of payment records with metadata including payment ID, next payment date indicator, and location saved status.
frontend/src/components/settings/Princip: Card component that displays the user's Internet Identity Principal ID with copy-to-clipboard functionality for sharing with administrators.
frontend/src/components/transfer/JsonTra: Card component for exporting and importing application data as JSON with options to merge or overwrite existing data.
frontend/src/components/visits/PartyVisi: Dialog component for recording party visits with payment amount, comment, next payment date, visit date/time, and optional geolocation capture. Validates that next payment date is required when amount is zero.
frontend/src/context/ActorSessionContext: React context provider that wraps the actor (backend interface) and exposes actor state, loading flags, error handling, and a stable principal key for query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminPrinc: React Query hooks for managing admin principals: fetching list, adding, removing, and checking if caller is admin. Uses temporary extended actor interface until backend bindings are regenerated.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuth.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile (name). Includes retry and stale-time configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useBranding.t: React Query hooks for fetching and setting shop branding (name and logo as ExternalBlob). Includes cache invalidation on mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useMapLocatio: React Query hook that fetches all parties with visit records, extracts location data from visits, and returns map-ready data with party info, coordinates, and visit counts.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useParties.ts: React Query hooks for party management: fetching all parties, fetching single party, validating/generating party IDs with detailed logging, and adding parties with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePayments.t: React Query hooks for payment operations: fetching party visit record metadata, recording payments, and recording party visits with location. Invalidates multiple related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStaffPermi: Stub file indicating staff authentication has been removed; exports no-op hooks for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTodayDashb: React Query hook that aggregates today's visits across all parties, sorts by payment date, calculates total amount, and returns structured dashboard data with auto-refresh every minute.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTodayNotif: React Query hook that fetches parties with payments due today, with automatic refresh every minute and refetch on window focus.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTransfer.t: Provides React Query mutations for exporting and importing upgrade data (parties, payments, branding) with cache invalidation on successful import.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorSafe.ts: Similar to useActor but with retry logic and additional error handling states for safer actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useDueTodayAlert.ts: Simplified hook for managing due-today alerts; currently returns empty state as full implementation would be expensive without backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout with delegation identity management and session persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaffAuth.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for staff authentication logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors, spacing, and chart colors using HSL color space.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parsePartiesFromE: Parses CSV files to extract party data (name, address, phone, PAN, due amount) with validation, error reporting, and detailed debug logging.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting and parsing money (with Indian rupee symbol), phone numbers, and PAN numbers.
frontend/src/lib/phone.ts: Normalizes phone numbers and creates tel: links for click-to-call functionality.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Converts between Date objects and nanosecond timestamps, formats dates/times, and handles datetime-local input strings.
frontend/src/lib/transfer/jsonTransfer.t: Handles JSON export/import of upgrade data with bigint serialization, file download, and merge logic for combining existing and incoming data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays today's dashboard with visit count, total amount collected, notifications, and a list of today's party visits with navigation and call actions.
frontend/src/pages/MapPage.tsx: Displays an interactive Leaflet map showing party locations with markers, loads Leaflet from CDN, and allows navigation to party details by clicking markers or visit counts.
frontend/src/pages/NewPartyVisitPage.tsx: Provides a searchable grid of party cards for selecting a party to record a new visit, opens PartyVisitFormDialog on selection.
frontend/src/pages/PartiesPage.tsx: Lists all parties in a searchable grid with add/edit functionality via PartyFormDialog, allows navigation to individual party details.
frontend/src/pages/PartyDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed party information with edit/delete actions, displays payment history, and provides dialogs for adding payments and visits.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Displays payment history and analytics for a selected party with search functionality, showing visit records and latest payment details.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Tabbed settings interface for profile, branding, Excel import, data transfer, and admin panel (conditionally shown for admin users).
frontend/src/pages/VisitDetailsPage.tsx: React page component that displays detailed information about a specific party visit record, including amount, date/time, location, and comments, with navigation back to dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/staffSession.ts: Empty utility file for staff session management.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking existing features (dashboard notifications, reports search) and pending feature requests for a CRM/Dashboard application with customer visit tracking functionality.
